title: dont know why im banned
body:
Took a break from League, came back and now my account is permanently banned. All I can imagine is someone gained access to my account then got it banned.

feelsfuckingbadman

replies.body:
Compromise seems likely in this case. Change your password (if it's still possible) and submit an account recovery ticket to support ASAP: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

You'll get a whole bunch of questions to prove ownership of the account, these aren't the be all and end all. Any information that is unique to the account but not visible on it is useful, so if you can't remember those exact questions, find similar info.

Once ownership has been verified and the account has been secured (I'd recommend changing the password for the attached email as well since you don't know how they got access) they will unban the account (assuming the ban was a result of actions taken under compromise and there wasn't any more to it).

If you have any concerns with your tickets or are unsure about anything just reply here and I'll help you best I can :)
Are you sure you didn't say shlt once? Rito get all salty bout everything. And they mostly dont unban people, even wrongly banned people.
